name: Gourmet Food Wizard
description:
It's a world of magic and gourmet food!Players play as the Mester, capture magic objects, make food, use a super variety of magic , embark on an adventure to find the Spar of All Magic!

Real-time combat + card mechanics!

 : Unlike ordinary turn-based card printing games, A Bite of Morserker combines the real-time combat system with the game mechanics of card strategy, giving players a brand new combat experience!

Monsters without health design

 no longer need to tedious calculation of enemy health!The traditional enemy health design has been abolished!Brainless use the corresponding magic element to defeat the enemy just!

capture of magic objects

 : the main character needs to capture magic objects as food, to make a variety of food, so that they have enough physical strength to fight against magic objects on the road of magic adventure!

Random Generated Levels

 : From Endless Desert, Deep Cave, Dragon's Roar Dungeon to Endless Desert, Death Lava Island, etc., the internal roads, enemies and organs, NPCs and trigger events are all randomly generated, and each adventure will be a different experience!
The game is now in the early experience stage, we have many ideas, need more time to improve the game slowly!Hope everyone can put forward a lot of valuable opinions, we together to complete this lovely magic food world!
If the game is popular, we will add multiplayer mode in the future, and the interaction between players will be more important!
